summary: A police detective with a striking resemblance for a murdered criminal impersonates the deceased to identify his murderer.
cast: Louis Jouvet|Madeleine Robinson|Léo Lapara|Monique Mélinand|Jean Meyer|Simone Sylvestre|Janine Viénot|Robert Vattier|Jacques Morel|Yvette Etiévant|Marianne Hardy|Paul Barge|Jean-Claude Malouvier|Jacques Roux|Gisèle Casadesus|Robert Arnoux|Charles Bayard|Anne Campion|Maurice Chevit|Janine Clairville|Jacques Denoël|Guy Favières|Gisèle François|Josette Hanson|Nicole Jonesco|Marcel Loche|Jacqueline Mansard|René Pascal|Jacqueline Pierreux|Guy Saint-Clair|Sylvie Serliac|Germaine Stainval|Jean Sylvère|Constance Thierry
title: Entre onze heures et minuit
